thread.title: Miley Cyrus Plans to Play Naked Concert With The Flaming Lips
thread.title_full: Miley Cyrus Plans to Play Naked Concert With The Flaming Lips

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Miley Cyrus Plans to Play Naked Concert With The Flaming Lips
text:
Comments According to the band's Wayne Coyne, the singer wants to play a concert where she, the Flaming Lips members and the audience are completely naked. 
Miley Cyrus plans to go completely nude while playing one of her upcoming concerts with The Flaming Lips . The band's frontman Wayne Coyne made the revelation in an Instagram post he sent out on Tuesday, October 13. Coyne posted pictures of him and his bandmates as well as Cyrus posing topless. He offered more details about the concert in the caption, saying that the former Disney princess wouldn't be the only one going naked and that the whole thing would involve milk, or milk-like liquid. "Oh f**k..!!! @mileycyrus is planning a show where her, the band ( us ) and the audience are all COMPLETELY naked with milk ( well white stuff that looks like milk) is being being spewed everywhere," he wrote and then revealed that the concert would be featured in a video for "Milky Milky Milk" off Cyrus and The Lips' collaborative effort, " Miley Cyrus and Her Dead Petz ". A photo posted by Wayne Coyne (@waynecoyne5) on Oct 13, 2015 at 9:14am PDT There's still no word on when the concert will exactly take place, but it will likely happen during the 22-year-old star and the group's upcoming tour. They're set to kick off the six-date jaunt on November 19 in Chicago.
